title: Trump's dig at Zelenskyy's fashion set the tone for the fiery meeting
shortDescription: Zelenskyy, whose country was invaded by Russia three years ago in an ongoing conflict, has been known for his casual style.

title: Trump's shouting match with Zelenskyy could rattle the world
shortDescription: If the stakes weren't so high, it could have been foreign policy as reality-TV.

title: No, Trump did not raise drug prices up to 4,200% | Fact check
shortDescription: An executive order by Trump rolled back some efforts by the Biden administration to control Medicare costs but it didn't change drug price caps.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy peace talks unravel
shortDescription: President Trump and Zelenskyy got in a heated exchange in the Oval Office as peace talks fall apart.

title: Post on replacing 'mother' in Wisconsin law lacks context | Fact check
shortDescription: The bill only replaces the word "mother" a handful of times when referencing IVF. The word "mother" is used throughout the rest of the bill.

title: The GOP budget could impact Medicaid. Who does the program cover?
shortDescription: About 60% of American adults have either used Medicaid for health care coverage or know someone who has.

title: Trump administration loophole blocks medical research funding
shortDescription: The Trump administration is using a loophole to block the U.S. National Institutes of Health process for issuing new research grants.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy clash in Oval Office over war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy got into a heated exchange during their meeting in the Oval Office.

title: Trump tells Zelenskyy to leave after heated Oval Office clash
shortDescription: Trump said he's "determined that President Zelenskyy is not ready for Peace if America is involved." A U.S. deal for Ukraine's minerals appeared dead.

title: US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy meet
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy had a heated exchange during their meeting over Ukraine Aid and mineral rights.

title: Trump admin continues to purge federal workforce: What to know
shortDescription: Thousands of federal workers are out of a job, and further cuts are expected. Meanwhile, a federal judge has blocked the firings.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy press conference canceled after White House Clash
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy had been set to meet at the White House Friday after weeks of back-and-forth.

title: Trump to sign executive order making English official language of US
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will sign an executive order that for the first time will make English the official language of the United States.

title: Trump picks former Senate candidate Hung Cao for Navy Under Secretary
shortDescription: Cao during his Senate run in 2024 was critical of diversity, equity and inclusion initiatives, referring to them as a "far-left ideological agenda."

title: Will there be a government shutdown? Congress hurtles toward deadline
shortDescription: Lawmakers are setting up a game of chicken as the government shutdown deadline of March 14 nears.

title: After 'testy' fight, Trump and Zelenskyy meet to hash out mineral deal
shortDescription: With some hurdles yet to clear, President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy are trying to hammer out an unprecedented mineral deal.

title: Trump wants to fire officials who could protect federal workers' jobs
shortDescription: If federal workers think their firing was illegal, they have to go to obscure boards agencies in which Trump has also fired key officials.
